Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: J. Blanks "avid cook"
Reviews.Content: Bought this just prior to a cruise.  Pentax has been a favorite of my for years.  I wanted something that could take a few bumps and use snorkeliing.  Didn't get a chance to do a lot of underwater photos, but the camera does a great job. A pro on the cruise said he has been as deep as 40ft. with no problem. I wouldn't push it that far, but there was no problem at 10ft. for sure.  Some great shots on the trip.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a rugged, waterproof camera at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: not waterproof
Reviews.Author: spork
Reviews.Content: The camera worked great for the first few days of our honeymoon until we took it into the water. Shortly after we used it the screen went blank even though the camera was on. We were unable to take any pictures afterwards, there were lines all over the screen every time we tried to take a picture. We called Pentax, who replaced it (said it was extremely water damaged), but the new camera is having the same problems as the old even though it hasn't touched the water.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money!!
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Whitaker
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, for snorkeling, diving or taking pictures above or below the water.  Shutter lags a little but would recommend to anyone looking for a tough waterproof affordable camera.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof (or at least, not the one I bought)
Reviews.Author: Parque Tayrona
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera less than a month ago and the first time I took it to the water (last Tuesday) it exploded inside. It is useless now. I bought it from Beach Camera. Since I had thrown away the original package, Beach Camera refused to change the camera... I know this may rarely happen but it happened to me and I wasted 243 dollars. Thank you Beach Camera.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: amanda
Reviews.Content: This is such a great camera.  The quality of the pictures and videos is just as we expected.  I am excited to use it more.  We have not used it under water at all so I cannot attest to how well it works for that.  There are a lot of options on this camera so I have not had a chance to use/learn everything about it but cannot wait to continue to explore what it can do!

Reviews.Title: Great value for a Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: schenkermeister
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, been using it in the back country of Idaho for fish research. I use it snorkeling often, and even use it under the Ice!

Reviews.Title: Takes Outstanding Pictures
Reviews.Author: Susan W
Reviews.Content: Purcahsed this for doing some water activities.Never ended up using it for snorkelling, but it has replaced my every day camera.Love it.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: DMC
Reviews.Content: Good value for the dollar.  Takes great photos and the zoom is efficient, used it in Yellowstone and got great shots. Speed of taking pictures was a little slower than expected.

Reviews.Title: Nice Package.
Reviews.Author: s2222 "s2222"
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a gift primarily because it was shockproof, waterproof with accessories so was ready to go right out of the box. The price was excellent, the seller packaged it well and got it to me before the "date expected".Turned out the recipient has purchased one for himself before Christmas. The company allowed me to return it with no questions asked. Communication from the seller was great. Emailed my directions on how to return, emailed me when they received the return and gave me a timeframe as to when I could expect a refund. Great seller who instills confidence.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: daniel lee gilbert
Reviews.Content: awesome package deal, well worth the little extra it cost to get the package deal, will definitely be ordering more products

Reviews.Title: Good Camera - Sturdy
Reviews.Author: Ovieda Estrada "Insight Seeker"
Reviews.Content: I used to own another waterproof camera that leaked the first time I used it so I was looking for something more sturdy.  This seemed to fit the bill and it did work adequately the 4-5 times I used it.  I was in Hawaii snorkeling so much of the water is very clear.  As compared to the other camera I had, the pictures this one takes are not as clear and crisp so I'll continue to look for a better underwater camera in a reasonable price range.  And I took many of the pictures in the same location underwater in similar weather.  As I compared the two sets of pictures when I got home, I realized the other camera had taken much clearer pictures.Also The placement of the record button is directly underneath the zoom lens button so guess what I did underwater while trying to swim, navigate around coral and hold my camera.  I accidentally pushed the record button and got some great, blurry footage of my flippers, my swimsuit, the sand and all the pictures I thought I was taking I was not.  And I ran the battery down and I've learned you can't switch batteries or cards while the camera is wet without risking water getting in so that trip was a bust.For the price, I think it does OK.  Still looking for the crisp, clear, point and shoot pictures with a sturdy case for $500 and under so if anyone has any suggestions....... would appreciate it for next year's trip to Maui.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, terrible reader
Reviews.Author: Todd Ferrante
Reviews.Content: Thus far the camera has been very good, but beware the card reader included in this bundle.  It is the Zeikos ZE-SDR5.  Check out the reviews for it.  It corrupts the data on your SD card, necessitating a reformat of the card.  I would give the camera 4 stars, but the card reader gets zero.

Reviews.Title: Great product and accessories
Reviews.Author: khristy myers
Reviews.Content: very durable and takes good pics.  The better the sunlight the better the underwater pics.  Let 6 yr old son use for most of trip and he dropped it some and banged it some, and it was nice not to have to worry about it. would suggest it!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: Roger Quaid
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Daughter before she went on vacation.  It takes wonderful pictures and she takes it with her everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Very good camera, I love it, very good, I highly recommend to u guys who wanna good camera, very good, choose it.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Cristian Balanescu "Bala"
Reviews.Content: order came sooner than I expected, some issues :case is smaller, one batery is pentax the other olimpus  the baterry depletes very quikly ,tripod is not so good quality,but the camera itself is very good I didnt put it underwater the waterproofing is not what I expected but the pictures and editing tools are great.

Reviews.Title: Bullet proof so my Grand daughter can use it
Reviews.Author: Eugene F Stringham
Reviews.Content: This is a great toy. And easy enough for my 3 year old to use and survive the experience. Love it

Reviews.Title: Great for outdoor adventures
Reviews.Author: troy groetken
Reviews.Content: I like the build of the product.  The pictures are excellent. Yes it is for rugged areas and use. I just wish a camera lens cover came with the product or an automatic one was built in.

Reviews.Title: Cool!
Reviews.Author: teeba0
Reviews.Content: Love the features of this camera. Haven't had chance to use under water yet, but will when we go to St. Lucia this spring.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PURCHASE
Reviews.Author: Margaret A. Poynton
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my daughter for Christmas. Camera is amazing.  Extra accessories were a real bonus.  Great buy

Reviews.Title: Great package combo
Reviews.Author: Boring2u
Reviews.Content: Granted, I may not have needed all of the items on here (and the case isn't exactly a perfect fit for this camera), but it was a good package.  To the seller, I would recommend including a screen protector that doesn't need to be cut manually (I never use this type as they typically bend or do not perform well after cutting).  Otherwise, a great value when the price is low enough.  I like the blue color much better than some of the other options!

Reviews.Title: Afghanistan deployment
Reviews.Author: John Dickman
Reviews.Content: Great Value, great Camera, did great on my deployment to Afghanistan.  It was easy to use and functioned well in all extreme environments.  I liked the feature that the camera pieces together three pictures to create an ultra panoramic picture.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Joseph E. Myers
Reviews.Content: Amongst other features this camera has one of the finest Macro features of any camera I've ever seen. My job requires me to take close ups normally with a field microscope. This camera allows me to photograph many subjects equivalent to the field microscope

Reviews.Title: Good in daylight.
Reviews.Author: Karen Ann Moffat
Reviews.Content: This cameral easily tucked into a pocket. The floating wrist band was handy while snorkeling. The camera was easy to use even for this amateur's first use in the water. Liked that almost every thing that I would need was contained in the bundle.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the performance and quality of this camera. I'm not going diving with it but for the rough environment I use it in its perfect. Good quality photos that can be blown up beyond my needs and good battery life. This will be in my working collection of cameras for years to come.

Reviews.Title: I received all parts included in the kit.
Reviews.Author: Nikolay
Reviews.Content: I have revied as 2 star because battery and cad reader hadn't included in my kit.Sharp after my review I received a e-mail with shippment detailes for missingitems. I'm hapy with the service this saller did.Other than that: the camera has exelent performance.

Reviews.Title: Up to par
Reviews.Author: DW
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints. The product is well worth the money and my wife really enjoys it. I bought her a 14 megapixel camera a year ago for a little more than this one and this is much more versatile, especially since it's strong enough you're not afraid to take it outdoors.

ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio WG-3 White 16 MP Digital Camera (White) Premiere Bundle Includes 8GB Memory Card, Reader, Battery, Case, Tripod, Floating Wrist Strap, Screen Protectors, & Lens Cleaning Kit.
